title: Civil rights expanded by Supreme Court

content.question: Which of the following did the most to expand civil rights in the 1950's?

choices.label: State legislative decisions desegregating public accommodations
State court decisions outlawing poll taxes
The passage of voting-rights legislation by Congress
The Supreme Court decision declaring state-mandated school segregation to be unconstitutional

content.answer: The Supreme Court decision declaring state-mandated school segregation to be unconstitutional

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
